Title: Israel has stated that it is interested in a ceasefire at this mo...
Description: Israel has stated that it is interested in a ceasefire at this moment to focus on the larger threat: The Iranian regime, which threatens to destory Israel almost on a weekly basis, while rushing towards a nuclear weapon. However, given Hezbollah’s history and the Lebanese government’s repeated inaction, it remains uncertain whether the agreement will hold and how it will unfold. It is also unclear when the thousands of displaced Israeli families will return to their homes up north. Here are the key principles of the deal:

Title: 🖼 🚨 BREAKING: After 416 days since October 8, 2023, when Hezbol...
Description: 🚨 BREAKING: After 416 days since October 8, 2023, when Hezbollah launched a large-scale war against Israel from Lebanon, a U.S.-brokered ceasefire has been reached. It is set to begin tomorrow - 10 am (local time), Wednesday, November 27, 2024.🚨The war involved the firing of thousands of Hezbollah rockets, mortar shells, explosive drones, and more, causing devastating destruction. Over 60,000 people were displaced from northern Israel, and more than 70 civilians were murdered.In response, the IDF achieved significant military successes, including the elimination of Hezbollah’s top leadership, such as Secretary-General Hassan Nasrallah. The IDF also destroyed Hezbollah’s infiltration tunnels to Israel and neutralized most of the group’s rocket arsenal and many of its military assets. All of these and more led to Hezbollah to accept a ceasefire while disconnecting itself from the ongoing war in Gaza.
